title: Bubble-Mediated Generation of Airborne Nanoplastic Particles
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00124A, Paper
Eva R. Kjaergaard, Freja Hasager, Sarah Suda Suda Petters, Marianne Glasius, Merete Bilde
Micro- and nanoplastic particles have been detected in most environmental compartments. The presence of microplastics in the remote marine atmosphere and close to large lakes suggests bubble mediated water-air transfer...
